t: When*pn the Lord*s restored the fortunes of Zion, we*ld were like those who dream.
Then*ln our mouth was filled with laughter, and*ld our tongue with shouts of joy; then*ln they said among the nations, “The*ld Lord*s has done great things for them.”
The*ln Lord*s has done great things for us; we*ld are glad.
Restore*pn our fortunes, O Lord,*s like*ld streams in the Negeb!
Those*ln who sow in tears shall*ld reap with shouts of joy!
He*ln who goes out weeping, bearing*ld the seed for sowing, shall*ln come home with shouts of joy, bringing*ld his sheaves with him.
